about_the_game:
In a bygone world, advanced technology thrived, guarded by various guilds against demons and those who exploited magical powers. At least until a temporal anomaly claimed sixty percent of humanity. The continents shifted and the world was torn apart as time left mankind behind. Fast forward to 2030, an eccentric priest emerges, offering to restore the past world. Amidst a shattered reality, his audacious claim sparks desperate hope for those who remember what was lost.

Features!

  • Souls-like combat
  • Semi-open world
  • RPG elements

short_description: A semi-open-world action RPG in a medieval-styled modern world. Fifty years after a great time disaster that killed most of mankind, two factions start looking for a way to restore the old world.
